ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", OR ( ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__Suryo__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__SellTankaJPY__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__PrintFlag__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__SeikyuBangou__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__TorihikisakiLink__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__Recordtype__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__SalesAccountedDateInvoicing__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__TextFTMSSOID__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__curr__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__CurrencyBuying__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ExchangeRateID__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ExchangeRateIDVAT__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__KawaseSel__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__KawaseBay__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ExchangeRateSellingVAT__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ExchangeRateBuyingVAT__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ExchangeRateSellingUpdate__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ExchangeRateBuyingUpdate__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__CurrencyConversionSelling__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__CurrencyConversionBuying__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__Tariff__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__InsatuyouSyohin__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ContainerID__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__InsatuyouSyohinEng__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__Description__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__BillNameForInternal__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__Bikou__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__Suryo__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ChargeUnitInPrint__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ChargeUnit__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ContainerSize__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__TaxInitial__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__USDTaxAdjustmentSell__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__AmountSellingLocalAdjustment__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__AmountSellingUSDAdjustment__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ADVANCE_PAYMENT_ON_BEHALF_OF__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__AdjustedAfterClosingSelling__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__VAT_INVOICE_ISSUE_STATUS__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__CollectDueDateAutoSetting__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__CollectionDueDate__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__BuyTankaJPY__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__BuyTankaUSD__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__TAX_ADJUSTMENT__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__USDTaxAdjustment__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__AmountBuyingLocalAdjustment__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__AmountBuyingUSDAdjustment__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__AdvancePaymentOnBehalfOfOurCompany__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__AdjustedAfterClosingBuying__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__PayDueDateAutoSetting__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__PaymentDueDate__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__Payer__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__NyukinKakuninzumi__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__ReceiptanceDate_del__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__BANKTRANSITTYPE__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__Nyukingaku__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__AMOUNT_PAID_SELLING_USD__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__BankAccountForReceiving__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__SellDetail__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__BadDebtCheckBox__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__BadDebt__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__BeneficiaryBuyingContact__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__payment_category__c), ISCHANGED(clofor_com_cfs__PaymentDate__c) ), OR ( CONTAINS(clofor_com_cfs__Anken__r.RecordType.DeveloperName,"lock"), CONTAINS(clofor_com_cfs__Anken__r.RecordType.DeveloperName,"Lock") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This record is locked! Please contact your administrator or supervisor for further information.
